amendment.description: Amendment sought to condition implementation of the bill to 90 days after submission to Congress by the the Securities and Exchange Commission of a study to determine the effect of the bill's separate vote requirements on the ability of issuers to recruit and retain executives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to insert conditional implementation provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 242 (Roll no. 242).
